org.diirt.graphene.profile.io

Class CSVWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diirt.graphene.profile.io.CSVWriter

  • public final class CSVWriter
extends Object
    Handles writing data to a .CSV file.
    Author:
    asbarber

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DELIM
      Comma delimiter for a .CSV formatted output file.
      static String QUOTE
      Quote delimiter for a .CSV formatted output file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List arrayCombine(Object... items)
      Combines all items as a list.
      static File createFile(String filename)
      Creates a CSV file with the specified name.
      static File createNewFile(String filename)
      Creates a CSV file with the specified name.
      static void writeData(File csvFile, List<List> rows)
      Writes each row as a set of entries in the .CSV file and outputs a new line between each row.
      static void writeRow(File csvFile, List row)
      Writes each item in the list as a separate entry in the .CSV file and outputs a new line in the file.
      static void writeRow(File csvFile, Object data)
      Writes the data as a string row in the .CSV file.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewFile

        public static File createNewFile(String filename)
        Creates a CSV file with the specified name. Will overwrite an existing file!
        Parameters:
        filename - path and name of file
        Returns:
        created CSV file

      • createFile

        public static File createFile(String filename)
        Creates a CSV file with the specified name. Will not overwrite an existing file! Instead a unique name will be found by appending .# to the original name.
        Parameters:
        filename - path and name of file
        Returns:
        created CSV file

      • writeData

        public static void writeData(File csvFile,
                             List<List> rows)
        Writes each row as a set of entries in the .CSV file and outputs a new line between each row. Essentially, each row contains items that represent the column entries within that row.
        Parameters:
        csvFile - file to write to
        rows - cells to write

      • writeRow

        public static void writeRow(File csvFile,
                            List row)
        Writes each item in the list as a separate entry in the .CSV file and outputs a new line in the file.
        Parameters:
        csvFile - file to write to
        row - entries to write

      • writeRow

        public static void writeRow(File csvFile,
                            Object data)
        Writes the data as a string row in the .CSV file.
        Parameters:
        csvFile - file to write to
        data - data to write

      • arrayCombine

        public static List arrayCombine(Object... items)
        Combines all items as a list. The primary use is if an item itself is a list, all the elements of the item is added to the complete list. That is, all sub-items of an item are added to the overall list.
        Parameters:
        items - object elements to combine
        Returns:
        all items and sub-items combined into one collection
